sense.name: One thing following another in time or space.
sense.examples: The doctor saw a succession of patients. A succession of stalls offered soft drinks. The presidency was a succession of failures.

sense.name: The action of following in order.
sense.examples: He played the trumps in succession. The doctor saw many patients in succession. We performed many duties in succession.

sense.name: (ecology) the graudal and orderly process of change in an ecosystem whereby one community replaces another.
sense.examples: Succession occurs in all systems. The succession happened over thousands of years.

sense.name: A human being's acquisition of property by descent or by will.
sense.examples: His succession finally occurred yesterday. The succession of the prince happens this afternoon.
